A Little About me ...

I have A strong passion for technology

I'm 30 years old , I know i'm not so young , but for this reason i know I 'll put all my energy to be a faster learner.
My background is as a surveyor in Italy untill 21 , then i moved to London to have fun and learn English ,while here I ve started working as chef ,I did that untill I was 28 . Then i realize that it wasn't my path. So I had an idea of building a software and I've started to split the project and do some research about it .
Since then i found a new world and I decied to get Deep into It.
I ve started with little Html , Css then C (with CS50x course), Python and Javascript. But I know that if we study with more passioned people like me and create a community we all help each others.

Here is WHy...

I would love to be part of your community

I find your your Concept so Unique and well Structured , You help people to fulfill their dream to work as a developer, you create a strong community and also give the student the possibility to help next students , is Just a Perfect and profitable Circle for the Community .
